domain.square

Class TitleDeedSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.square.Square
      • domain.square.OwnableSquare
        • domain.square.TitleDeedSquare
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TitleDeedSquare
extends domain.square.OwnableSquare
    Represents the TitleDeedSquare concept on Ultimate Monopoly Game.
    Author:
    Team Pennybags
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Overview:
    Responsible for calculating rent, buying buildings and handling rent.

      • landOn

        public void landOn(Player player)
        Performs required actions when player lands on this.
        Overrides:
        landOn in class domain.square.OwnableSquare
        Parameters:
        player - Player who lands on this square.
        Requires:
        nothing
        Effects:
        If this has an owner and the landed player is not the owner, playerLanded pays rent to the owner. Updates the GameController's field indicating current square's buyability according to this.
        Modifies:
        owner, playerLanded, GameController

      • buyHouse

        public boolean buyHouse()
        Increases the number of houses of this if this and owner satisfies required conditions.
        Returns:
        true if a house is bought, false otherwise.
        Requires:
        this has an owner.
        Effects:
        If owner has enough money and this satisfies the conditions of buying a house (owner has majority ownership, this does not have a hotel or skyscraper, has houses less than 4), a house is built on this property and number of houses is increased. Player's money is decreased to pay the price of the house.
        Modifies:
        this, owner

      • buyHotel

        public boolean buyHotel()
        Increases the number of hotels of this if this and owner satisfies required conditions.
        Returns:
        true if a hotel is bought, false otherwise.
        Requires:
        this has an owner.
        Effects:
        If owner has enough money and this satisfies the conditions of buying a hotel (owner has majority ownership, has 4 houses, does not have a hotel or skyscraper), a hotel is built on this property and number of houses is set to zero. Player's money is decreased to pay the price of the hotel.
        Modifies:
        this, owner

        public boolean buySkyScraper()

        public boolean repOK()
        Overrides:
        repOK in class domain.square.OwnableSquare
